POST.POST_BODY: I have my GD glucose test next week and an worried because I was overweight before becoming pregnant and have a family history of diabetes. Can anyone give me some advice as to how GD is managed if my test does indicate high glucose levels? Thanks!!

RESPONSE.RESPONSE_BODY: First of all, the history doesn't guarantee that it will show gd. I have a super strong history and a lot of other factors that raise my chance. I passed & you can too. :) (always hope for the best) but, if you fail this first test, you move to a 3 hour test. I know a lot of women who bombed the 1 hour but aced the 3 hour test. Good luck

I had it with my last baby.. it sucked I had to give myself a shot twice a day.. I'm am trying any and all things to avoid that.with this one eat healthy and try walking ALOT! Drink water in place of juice or soda stay away from caffeine
